messages.subject: junk food binge
messages.msgSnippet: ... HA!!  I m the only person I know who could make a candy bar last a week, because I only want a taste of chocolate occasionally.  After all these posts, I
messages.messageBody:
> You know all this talk about junk food has sent me into a binge. I have
> ingested two doughnuts, a bowl of ice cream and a bag of doritos (just a
> small bag, lol). My husband cooked pork chops and potatoes, but I chose
> the
> doughnuts and ice cream. I hope this "de-schooling" food doesn't last
> forever!
>
>

HA!! I'm the only person I know who could make a candy bar last a week,
because I only want a "taste of" chocolate occasionally. After all these
posts, I poured a bowl full of m&ms just to see what would happen!
Mary J


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
